content: welcome to my first ever written pattern i am by no means an expert and very much a novice myself but maybe you can learn a thing or two form this simple knit the scrappy stripe is a bottom-up raglan sweater seamlessly knit in the round it is made to utilise your leftover dk bits and pieces and have some fun with balloony stripy sleeves we will knit the sleeves first then the body after which we will attach the pieces and work raglan decreases till the neckline if at any point you feel stuck or something doesn t make sense youtube and google are your friends **note i am no designer but rather a very eager novice this pattern was made more so to document my process/steps so i am aware i probably made many a mistakes along the way i urge you to tailor it to your liking make the sleeves more or less balloony shorter or longer tighter or looser fit of the body overall **
